website_summaries.verdict: They are well-made and useful, but some of the other brands we tested offer similar quality and more  quantity.
pros: Has convenient features such as thick, recyclable material, 13" length, easy-tear perforations, and easy openings
cons: Pricey, since you only get 270 bags per pack
They have cores, but they can be recycled
Consumers who tried the lavender-scented bags say the smell is overwhelming

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags - much thicker than the ones you buy at the store. The scent is not overpowering. ----- If you found my review helpful, please click the "Yes" button below! :)
customer_reviews.author: madeline audreyTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Not eco friendly
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were compostable. Very misleading & I’m disappointed! I would’ve definitely bought the other brand if I would’ve known. They make it sound like they’re made of recycled materials and biodegradable/compostable of some sort. Yeah ok the tiny core of the roll is recycled. Whoopdy doo. Congratulations on confusing everyone.
customer_reviews.author: deanna delgado

customer_reviews.title: Smells worse than my dog's poo
customer_reviews.text: Will be returning these. The smell is utterly overwhelming. Does not smell anything like lavender. I had them in a bag in my kitchen and my entire kitchen reeks. I put them outside on my patio in the sun for two days and the entire patio stinks. Am I the only one who feels this way? Isn't anyone a little suspicious that there are over 11,000 reviews of ... dog poop bags?
customer_reviews.author: P. Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Best bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best dog waste bag I've ever used. Medium sized dogs with large output, and these bags are excellent. The rolls are small. 15 bags to a roll, and each roll is approximately 2.5" tall by 1" thick. Laid flat, the bags are 12.5" x 8.75". Pros: - NOT translucent / no see thru shadows - Smell good (the bag, DOH!) - Holds a lot - Roll of 15 easily fits in your pocket Cons: - You have to tie the bags yourself. There is no self-tie. I personally spin them to help keep odors in, then knot and pull. Works perfectly every time. The bags are large enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jiggly Puff

customer_reviews.title: Smell TERRIBLE  and "Earth Rated" is False Advertising!
customer_reviews.text: Ugh - I bought these by accident because they look similar to "the poop bag" ones that actually ARE biodegradable and compostable. There's nothing "earth rated" about these - they're just plastic. On top that, the synthetic "lavender" fragrance smells horrible and gives me a headache. If I didn't want to further contribute to the plastic waste problem on our planet, I would just throw them out. I guess if you're looking for poop bags that pick up poop, these are fine but how many poop bags fail that job?! I feel like some of these reviews are fake.
customer_reviews.author: M. Maire

customer_reviews.title: Beware: These bags are a con - nothing "Earth Aware" about them
customer_reviews.text: Nowhere on this page, the box, or the bags is there anything about them being biodegradable. They seem to be made of plain old medium-duty plastic. I'm sorry that I fell for the con; it's all marketing. They also stink of some perfumy scented chemical. Look for your biodegradable bags elsewhere. I will.
customer_reviews.author: Ed B

customer_reviews.title: Unscented have horrible petro chemical odor
customer_reviews.text: When they contacted me to ask me if I was happy I said I was pretty sure there was a mistake. The box said unscented and they had a horrible smell. I triple checked with other people. They sent me some emails like 'I hope we helped you.' No you didn't. I will order another brand. (Remember this just now because I smelled this rank odor on my hands....)
customer_reviews.author: R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: What a stink!!
customer_reviews.text: OK, I should know better. Got these as they looked sturdy and had pretty good reviews. But the fact that these stinkers are scented missed me! And they do stink! The smell of manufactured lavender permeated the house, the smell even came through the shipping bag! Used one and the smell of lavender was on my hands and the pocket of my jacket...had to wash the jacket to get rid of the nauseating smell. Unless you love the smell of those scented clothes for the dryer, the kind that smell up the entire neighborhood with their molecules of air pollution, you won't want to get these poop bags!
customer_reviews.author: Dr.L.

customer_reviews.title: I prefer these bags for several reasons!
customer_reviews.text: This company is environment friendly, their bags are truly leak proof. I hate bags that rip easily, and if you have a dog you know why! It doesn't hurt that it smells nice lol I do love the lavender scented bags, and the size is perfect even though I have a small dog. I will continue to buy them because they are also affordable, and again I'm sure you relate too to the bag expenses - it can add up! Thanks guys!!! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Astrid De la Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Individual bags are hard to open
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, feels sturdy BUT the individual bags are hard to open up, once you tear it off from the roll. The perforation is just crimped too tightly that you have to scrub/crinkle it or get you fingers wet somehow to pry it open. No freakin way I'm licking my fingers when I'm handling the dog for a walk. The only solution I have right now is to 'prep' a couple of bags before going out - open it up, fold the edge so when I shove them in my pocket I can easily re-open them.. The dispenser will not be useful for me and will return it immediately once it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalinda K.

customer_reviews.title: Had to return these...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were highly rated and described as large. I have a 90 lb pointer and these bags are not big enough. After picking up his poo, there's little room to tie a knot in the bag to seal it. Truthfully, I don't see how you have much room even with a medium sized poo. If you're like me you don't want to accidentally touch any part of it and this bag simply isn't long enough.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rowland

customer_reviews.title: I am not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: i bought these bags becaue they are supposed to be large bags (9 x 13). Large enough to pick up the poop from a large dog. A bread bag is 9 x 20. Seriously, what do you consider as a large dog? I have a husky, she is not large by any means , she is a mid-sized dog. I will need to use two bags to clean up her poop. These bags are supposed to be thick. What is considered to be thick? A bread bag is thicker. I feel the odor of these bags is a little overpowering, but my trash can might smell better. I would definitely not buy these bags again, I am not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: T. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bag large enough for a 70 lb dog
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 year old dog out grew the thinner and smaller bags we have been using. Also, the previous bags were quite thin and often punctured from the dried grass/weed stems left during the winter...yuck. I purchased these larger bags and they have been great! The larger opening allows me to scoop up the poop easily (i.e., it doesn't accidentally touch the top edge of the bag mouth, again yuck) and the increased thickness prevents any punctures while scooping. I got the Lavender scent, which is fine - how about one with some more guy-friendly cologne type scents? Just sayin'.....Great bags, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Aje_s

customer_reviews.title: GREAT value and they smell amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE these bags!! They are the perfect size for scooping our cat litter and they smell amazing. We've been using these bags for at least a year and we've never had a single one rip or tear. The scent doesn't fade and lasts until the very last bag. This box is also the perfect size!! We had bought a smaller amount in the past and went through them pretty quick. The 270 count is the way to go, and certainly better quality/more than you would get buying the smaller packs in store. The price is great for the number of bags we received, and I am happy we are restocked for a while now!
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan C.

customer_reviews.title: Not high quality.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these to help me spare using gloves for everything during this virus threat. Plus I have a dog. Size: Very good Strength: Average to poor. That is what disappoints me the most. Opening: Getting the top of each bag open is so hard! Scent: I love lavender but the strength of this perfume they use is overwhelming. It’s sickening. I was comparing them to the bags I get at my dog park and they fell short. I’m giving them away.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Garza

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch or poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Half way through the box, I noticed that with some rolls the bags were not sealed at one end so my hand went all the way through, then when I pulled out the next bag, it would not open as it was sealed on both ends. So on a roll of 15 bags, I ended up not being able to use at least 6-8 bags due to this. It's past the return window so I'll finish what I have but will not be buying this brand again. It's disappointing because I had no problems with earlier boxes/bags from this brand. May they switched manufacturers or a machine messed up.
customer_reviews.author: Preeti

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed - each bag was ripped/torn - unusable.
customer_reviews.text: I'd used these bags before w/good results, but my last purchase on April 18, 2018, every single bag shreds upon unfolding. I hoped maybe just one or two rolls were affected, but after unrolling each roll, I discovered there were none that were usable. :( Very frustrating, especially when needing a bag and that's all I had with me and I couldn't pick-up after my bag with a tattered bag. Love the thought of biodegradable bags, but this was a bit ridiculous. I threw them all away and purchasing elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Shamayah

customer_reviews.title: Stink, difficult to open and will not fit over pooper scooper.
customer_reviews.text: I do not understand the number of positive reviews for this product. These bags are very difficult to open which other reviewers pointed out and unlike other brands these bags are too small to fit over grabber type pooper scoopers. Also the smell is overpowering and “synthetic”.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Baker

customer_reviews.title: Boy was I fooled.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for biodegradable bags and these came up in my search. I guess they came up because they have "green" buzzwords all over their profile for this product. But if anything the are the strongest, sturdiest plastic I've ever used for poop bags. The exact opposite of what I wanted. So it's a good product if you want extra strong plastic. But I will never buy this product again. I'm usually pretty good at catching deceptive marketing practices, but...you got me. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Product is NOT biodegradable
customer_reviews.text: The title of this product is extremely misleading. The box they come in and the cardboard they are wrapped around are “Earth Rated”. The bags you are buying will end up in a landfill and will not biodegrade as the title of this product would imply. It’s one thing to create a product that’s bad for the environment. It’s another and much more sinister thing to trick people into thinking they are helping the environment. Shame on this company and their owner.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I wish there were more bags per roll. It has a scent that is pleasant, if not a little strong. I ordered the lavender scent one, but I also have sensitive senses. The bags are quite big and holds quite a bit of waste. It seems when rolling out a bag and trying to open it is a little difficult, due to masking during this pandemic. I have to wet my finger a little too separate the bag, but understandable. Actually, no problems with the smell of waste permate the bag. It’s very subtle, hence scented bag. Yes, you can see a little bit that there is something in the bag, but it’s a bag for waste.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Snob

customer_reviews.title: These are the best I've ordered - durable & large. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I use these bags for scooping kitty litter more than for cleaning up behind a dog. I can get several day's of scoop-age into a bag before sealing it; the scent keeps the room from smelling bad until I throw the bag away. I have three litter boxes in my very small cottage, and using these bags (as opposed to other scented, less durable bags) keeps the house smelling fresh. I highly recommend their use. I do occasionally dog-sit for a large Labrador who drops massive poops - the bags are capacious enough to handle even his big poops without any problems of getting waste on my hands when I pick them up and tie off the tops for disposal.
customer_reviews.author: Pat V.

customer_reviews.title: I love the scent, and when it transferred to the hanky in my pocket it smelled very nice
customer_reviews.text: I actually like the smell. When I’m walking my dog, I also carry a pretty handkerchief in my pocket. Today, I accidentally put that handkerchief sin the same pocket as the (unused!) poop bag...and the hankie smelled lovely! If you don’t like scents, these are definitely scented, And I think everyone perceives odors differently, but for me, the scent is not overwhelming or obnoxious, but quite pleasant. I use about 3 to 4 per day, since I walk my dog twice a day, so scent is important. And yes they are sturdy. And they don’t take up near as much room in my pocket as a grocery bag like I used to use.
customer_reviews.author: Joy from Texas

customer_reviews.title: These are either an amazing find or Green washing at its finest.
customer_reviews.text: I’m confused. If the bag are plastic it’s Text book green washing because name, and packaging are misleading. A recycled box/roll is a good step, but I’m very upset that the bags were made to look like they we’r compostable, just like their competitors. Some people claim these DO break down after 24months, which would be awesome, but that is not on the packaging if its true. At first glance I thought they were just plastic, but fingers crossed they break down. In short read carefully, and hope the company clarifies soon. They seem like thick plastic, and they seem like they would work well, but I’m still mad these bags are likely gonna be on earth A long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. And Mrs.McRenke

customer_reviews.title: Great Smell and a Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an earth friendly “doggie” bag that was scented to that the trash can didn’t smell in between trash days. The lavender scent of these bags is so subtle as to not be over powering, but is strong enough to get the job done! I highly recommend these bags. The dispenser (came in my previously purchased starter kit) also has a nice clip on the side to attach the bags once used so you do not have to hold bags in your hand. We found the place we stored the bags actually had such a pleasant smell we ended up buying some lavender candles! Solid product, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ScottG124

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Dog Poop Bags
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite dog poop bags: generally easy to open (nobody wants to lick their fingers before picking up poop), nicely sized, sturdy, leak-proof, reliable. I've tried many brands and have not found a better option. The "Earth Rated" name is a tad misleading: the bags are plastic, but contain a non-toxic, residue-free additive developed by EPI (Environmental Products Inc) "which helps them to break down, unlike traditional plastic bags," as it "reacts to variables such as heat, oxygen and agitation." So they're not fully biodegradable or compostable; environmentally, they're just somewhat better than other plastic bags.
customer_reviews.author: Nick O.

customer_reviews.title: Will Never Use Anything Else!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these bags! Definitely beats saving plastic grocery bags. The dispenser rolls are so easy to use and store. The bags are easy to open also....no spending 15 mins fighting to ply them open. I simply blow on the top of the bag and the layers separate! I bought the green unscented ones with this first purchase. I plan on going with the lavender selection next. Please give these a try if you are searching for poop bags. *Only worry I would have is if I had a bigger dog; not sure I'd want to pick up larger deposits with size of these bags. Maybe they sale bigger sizes too?*
customer_reviews.author: Adina

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled. These are NOT environmentally friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be fooled! There’s nothing environmental about these bags except the misleading branding. These are plastic bags, not biodegradable. They give themselves a green-sounding name and cardboard box, and they come up first in searches so they’ve obviously optimized their search words for people shopping for compostable bags, but these are plastic bags made in China. Full of chemicals, shipped from across the world, never to break down. Don’t support this lie.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Self tug of war to detach a bag
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 Italian greyhounds 12-23 lbs. I also use these bag’s when I clean out the cat box. The sturdiness is great, It’d be a perfect 10 if it wasn’t high maintenance to pull a part & if it came with a swingline finger tip to give a better grip on opening them. My ONLY complaint is none of the bags have been easy to separate from one another, the tear away part of each bag barely has an incision. No exaggerating, but I’m having to wrap one bag around my left hand and the other around my right fingers and have to pull a part.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: It’s the small things in life
customer_reviews.text: Never did I think I would write a review on dog poop bags. However anyone that has struggled to open a poop bag when it is snowing, sleeting, raining, freezing etc. knows how frustrating it is. Add to that my son is now old enough to take the dog out but was also struggling to open the bags. In search of the perfect poop bag I went to Amazon for reviews. The reviews do not lie - these are the best. The dispense and open easily, sent is not over powering and the are reasonably priced. This simple item will change your life as a dog owner!
customer_reviews.author: scanpennett

customer_reviews.title: The best poop bags you will ever use!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I never thought one day I would get excited about the quality of a bag that I use to pick up my dog’s poop....but, here we are. So much better quality than all the other brands I have used. They are nice and thick unlike the other thin bags that get holes or make you question whether the bag is that thin or if you have poop on your hand. I love that it comes with so many rolls! I got the lavender scented ones because poop smells (duh). I’m not one to like scented bags but, this is a winner. All around a good purchase. Don’t even think about it. Just buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah.

customer_reviews.title: Best bags we have ever used. The scented version is a bonus!
customer_reviews.text: These are our favorite dog 💩 bags. In the past we have always purchased the unscented, but after purchasing the scented bags, I feel like we were missing out. We take these with us on walks, leave some on the golf cart for when we go cruisin around, and also have them in the vehicle for when our dog goes with us somewhere, and unlike other bags we have used in the past, these really lock in the 💩 odor. Once we’ve picked up the 💩 and tied the bag in a knot, there’s no odor. So if we can’t get to a trash can immediately it’s not a major ordeal and nobody is holding their breath.
customer_reviews.author: Lacie

customer_reviews.title: Why I like these poop bags...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is the right size for my 80 pound black lab. The perforations are perfect and the bag tears at the perforations perfectly when separating each individual bag from the roll. The mouth of the bag is easy to open and it's not stuck together. These bags are not scented. These are the essential features that I look for in a poop bag and I'm glad that this bag meets all of them perfectly. I have no way of verifying whether these bags are environmentally sustainable other than going by what the manufacturer is claiming.
customer_reviews.author: Daya Tanjavur

customer_reviews.title: It's still plastic.
customer_reviews.text: I got these because the product page made it seem that it would be genuinely good for the earth through and through. Sure it's packaging is made out of recycled material. So are the cores. But honestly, that doesn't quite set it apart from the thousands of other products out there in the world. So its green (color). Don't let that fool you. The bags are still plastic. NOT biodegradable. Did I maybe miss something? I returned them because I really didn't see myself using this product when I am trying to shift towards zero-waste.
customer_reviews.author: Toothpick FactoryTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Makes you love poop
customer_reviews.text: I have never enjoyed picking up dog poop so much. Seriously since I reviewed these I have gone from yard to yard in my neighborhood picking up everyone’s dog poop for fun. You will be so delighted the Second you feel that warm poop on the other side of these bags. The fact that they are earth friendly just makes it that much better. Oh yeah it has even improved my relationship with my wife as we now enjoy picking up poo together. We laugh and play as we stroll up and down the side walk carrying poop in these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not store in car glove compartment
customer_reviews.text: We have had these bags for about a year, and we mainly use them for walks. We have stored them in the garage and in a drawer inside our house. Those bags are still good to this day. However, the bags I stored in my glove compartment disintegrated into a million pieces, so be away that they cannot be stored there. I am assuming it is a temperature issue. I guess it's good to know that they do actually degrade over time...
customer_reviews.author: MGM23

customer_reviews.title: Good bags and sturdy package
customer_reviews.text: These are thicker than typical bags. Pretty easy to tear off and open up, and a subtle benefit that there is a darker color near the bottom of the bag ;-) In the photo you can see u turned the box into a dispenser in my garage by cutting a diamond shaped hole near the bottom front of the box. You do have to open the box when a roll is gone to take off the small sticker on the bottom roll & then put the rest of the rolls back on top and fold the top shut. But the box is sturdy enough to hang up on the key hook when each bag is pulled out.
customer_reviews.author: EorS

customer_reviews.title: copious amounts!
customer_reviews.text: These bags can hold copious amounts of poop. They can hold so much that one might consider using it if caught in a discussion with any MAGA supporter: just have them hold it under their chin as they speak and you’ll catch it all. The best thing is knowing you are doing just a little more to save Mother Earth.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Don't care for the smell.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about ordering a bag with a scent as the idea of a perfumed sent along with poop just sounds dreadful. I read some reviews where people said they don't like scented things but found these mild and not unpleasant. However I did not like the smell while walking my dogs, this was while they were just empty. They are quite heavy duty, not sure I need something so strong. I guess these just aren't right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Greysean

customer_reviews.title: Best puppy surprise bags ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best poop bags I've ever owned! They smell nice which is great for when you're up close and personal with puppy surprises! They have never ripped while in action and did I tell you they smell pleasant? That's pretty much the greatest feature. The lavender scent isn't too over powering but it is powerful enough to help with the puppy surprise smell. I would highly recommend to any pup parent looking to cope with the smell of having to deal with the not so lovely presents their fur babies make.
customer_reviews.author: Corrina

customer_reviews.title: Best poop bags ever!
customer_reviews.text: We pick up dog bombs at least 3 times a day for our service dog. We have tried so many different brands claiming to be high quality, thick and durable. These are only bags we’ve used that doesn’t leave our hand smelling. They smell really good, they’re thick and survive washes and drying in pockets of my kids jeans and still work. We can tie to end of leash and isn’t super annoying and loud making constant crinkling noises either because it’s not think cheap material. Have used for friends when having them over and needing to change their babies diapers, more than enough room for 2 dirty diapers and then still easy to tie
customer_reviews.author: Mamaof3

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags if Used Correctly
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 50 pounds and has lots of big poops. These bags easily hold those poops and I have never had one rip or break. On a few occasions, I have accidentally touched my dogs poop when the bag slips off my hand. It is very gross and makes me gag when this happens. Of course, I do not blame the bag manufacturer for this and have started to pay more attention to bag placement when I have the bag over my hand and am grabbing my dog's feces. This is advice that you might also benefit from.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin J Wingard

customer_reviews.title: Worse than AmazonBasics for 2x the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bags, as they advertised extra thick and easy to open. Upon arrival, the bags are comparable to the AmazonBasics bags, but harder to open and almost twice the cost. Each bag takes 15-30 seconds to get open, even when using the thumb and finger method. Once the sides of the bag starts to separate, I still had to get a fingernail in between to open it all the way. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: corny

customer_reviews.title: Great bags. No problems. Prefer large roll style
customer_reviews.text: I have literally used around 2000 of these bags with maybe 2 or 3 bags that tore on opening. For those having difficulty getting the bags open, I recommend purchasing the large roll style. Some folks complain that the bags are TOO biodegradable, others that they are NOT biodegradable. I am not able to offer any wisdom to that dilemma, but in my experience they are strong. Occasionally I see where people have left bags on the ground instead disposing in the trash, and those bags seem to be decomposing. Which begs the question: If you want biodegradable, what's more biodegradable than a dog turd?
customer_reviews.author: K. B.

customer_reviews.title: Lavender doesn't make the smell better
customer_reviews.text: I routinely purchase these about every 2 to 3 months. The bags are easy to dispose of, good value, and are easy to pack. You can even fit a roll in your pocket or your purse. They work great for my 8lb miniature poodle. While they work great for little dogs, I'm unsure of how they'd work for bigger ones as the bags seem a little flimsy. I purchased the Lavender bags this time around, but I don't they really help with the odor. The smell combines with the dog waste and it isn't pleasant. I took a star off for the scent. All in all, I'd recommend just ordered the normal bags for a small to medium dog.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love my dog even more...
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is our baby. We adore her. It's also a lot more pleasant to walk her with these scented bags. I don't even notice the scent anymore but the few times I've used an unscented bag I DEFINITELY noticed the lack of scent! These bags are not as thin as most biodegradable ones and I know that means they take more time to degrade, but it's also nice to have a sturdier bag and still know that it WILL degrade eventually. The upsides of these bags outweigh the longer erosion time for me.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Who knew I’d run out of plastic shopping bags?
customer_reviews.text: I never really even thought about buying my own dog poop bags bc we always had a surplus of plastic shopping bags at the ready. Well, three weeks into quarantine and we were out of bags! Thank goodness for Amazon and Prime delivery. These bags smell WAY better than poop and are super strong. My only gripe is that I wish they were just a bit larger but, that’s bc I have large dogs with large poops. Just means I use trap bags sometimes instead of just one. There are tons of bags for the money and I am definitely going to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Pet sitter approved!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs of my own as well as canine clients to pick up after & these bags are great. I've been reordering them for a while now. I don't think any bag can seal in odor but I do notice with these that if we are on a long walk and I (unfortunately!) have to carry a full bag for a while it's not as offensive as some other bags. I also like that the spindle is not plastic, for environmental reasons as well as safety with the dogs should they get hold of one & chew it.
customer_reviews.author: D. V. Squires

customer_reviews.title: I love, my family loves, my local dog park loves, my dog loves!
customer_reviews.text: Best poop bags out there! I’m in love with these bags they are great! I have nothing to complain about. This is my first dog and I wanted to make sure I was doing every thing right so even the poop bags mattered to me. I’ve tried other biodegradable poo bags and nothing I mean nothing compares to these other bags. I find other bags to be too thin and my nails cut through them, not these! These are the perfect thickness! If your debating don’t! There awesome and 100% best poo bags for my pup and my cats litter! GET THEM IF YOU HAVE A PET!!
customer_reviews.author: Sally T.

customer_reviews.title: Poop bags that make picking up poop nicer...seriously!
customer_reviews.text: I have never tried scented poop bags but I wish I did a long time ago. When you have to carry the poop bag from the beginning of the walk, you want one that will not stink the entire way, right? Well, this is the bag for you. They are very durable and BONUS - they tell you what size is the side to open. You know how frustrating it is to try to open a dog poop bag and not know what end to open it from?! This company got it right! I would highly recommend to anyone with a furry pet who likes to poop a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Mary VanOostenbrugge

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly biodegradable
customer_reviews.text: I emailed the company asking if their bags were biodegradable and this is the response I received: “Our green-coloured bags contain an additive called, Totally Degradable Plastic Additive (TDPA), formulated by EPI, which accelerates the process of breaking the bags down when exposed to elements such as heat, oxygen and agitation. TDPA is non-toxic and the result of this degradation process converts the bag into carbon dioxide, water and biomass by use of microorganisms. This process is usually referred to as oxo-degradation.” So these bags are not exactly biodegradable, but perhaps still better than generic bags.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Millard

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: We tried a bunch of bags before landing on these. They're thick enough my nails don't puncture them and they do the job as expected. Light fragrance helps mask the order of its contents without being overpowering. They dispense easily. There's an easily removable sticker holding the first bag of each roll in place (we tried some brands that's sticker was so strong it ripped the bag). Small cardboard tube in center of each roll is the only additional waste. We've bought these multiple times. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kay J. Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought these. I recently moved into a brand new home with a dirt backyard. We have had a lot of rain lately and my backyard is a mud pit. Just when it starts to dry out it rains again. Because of this we cannot let our dog out into the backyard otherwise she will be covered in mud. This means we have to walk our dog numerous times throughout the day and night so she can do her business. At first we were using grocery bags, but quickly ran out, so I bought these bags. They work great! The situation has made us speed up our landscaping plans.
customer_reviews.author: Adam A. Wynn

customer_reviews.title: These Smell Great
customer_reviews.text: These bags really do eliminate the odor when you're walking. They smell nice and fresh and the scent is strong enough to mask/eliminate any bad odors that might be contained within the bag. They aren't the thickest bags I've used, but definitely aren't the thinnest either. The thickness of the plastic is definitely adequate, I don't worry about the bags ripping/tearing. I am glad that I bought these and would recommend them to any dog owner.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Karate

customer_reviews.title: BEST BAGS EVER
customer_reviews.text: These bags are awesome!! They have an amazing scent that doesn’t fade and it completely eliminates odors inside of the bag so I don’t have to walk around with a stinky bag. The dispenser is genius considering the twist on/off function to replace the bags, the velcro strap, and the hook! I’ve gone through at least ten dispensers from other companies where the strap breaks or the cap falls off and gets lost, which is not a problem with this dispenser. The bags themselves are incredibly strong, durable, and the perfect size so I don’t have to worry about getting anything on my hands. You won’t regret buying them!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: Strong bag and good for the enviornment!
customer_reviews.text: I like these bags . Storytime: I grabbed mushy poo off the sidewalk with a different bag and the while smearing the pickup (soft poo) ripped a poo bag and got dog poo all over my hand and my wife told me that these new green bags would stand up much better. Of course she was right no more pooey hands :) I have since fixed our soft poo issue (new food for our pup) But theses bags are much stronger and good for the environment too. Woohoo!.
customer_reviews.author: Mackguy

customer_reviews.title: These are poop bags.
customer_reviews.text: They pick up poop! WHAT I never notice the smell (probably because of something else overpowering - what could that be?), but these are long so we're comfortable picking up dookies with no fear of getting anything on us. Our 50lb husky/heeler has never made a pile large enough to question the sturdiness of these bags. They dispense very easily and are perforated for even easier use. We've gone through like 5 rolls of these so far and will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Easy to Tie, Large and Scented!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use / Tie, Large, Scented and Sturdy. Packaging is good.. but wish there was as easier way to open the usable side of bag without having to wet the sides.. its little inconvenient to rush and pry open when your dog is done and you have to treat him/her in one hand and leash on other.. So I started keeping few bags handy that were previously opened by rubbing the sides.. Overall very good and I will most likely purchase it again..However, I might keep an eye to find an easy open varieties if they are available
customer_reviews.author: VBG

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We just started using the Earth Rated Poop Bags and are very happy with them. The bags we had before tended to rip when separating them from the roll, these don't. With the bags we had before we could not easily tell the top from the bottom. With these, you can see a line indicating that it is the bottom of the bag. With the bags we had before, we could barely get them tied because they were shorter than these. These are easy to tie. The scent is nice and not overwhelming. Plus, we are happy to use recycled materials. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki T

customer_reviews.title: Please make it easier to see where the bags separate
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent bags. Very convenient to carry without being in the way. They do the essential job without any excess scent. The bags separate easily enough from the roll once you’ve identified the point of separation. It sure would be wonderful, though, if that point of separation or more visible. A colored line, a little arrows, anything. I have trouble finding it in the dark, or when my mask has fogged up my glasses. Otherwise, A1 product!
customer_reviews.author: mmccluski

customer_reviews.title: Necessary and nice
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand for years and have always been pleased. The bags are well packaged, easy to access, sturdy, scented and reasonably priced. Our trash removal service requires double bagging of dog waste and these bags make that automatic when they are added to the weekly trash bag. (Hint: carry a few opened bags for quick access if your dog, like mine. feels the urge in the middle of the street with traffic coming!)
customer_reviews.author: BDP74

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because reviews say they are strong and thick, and I was willing to pay extra for a better quality product. These bags are...wait for it... crappy. They are the same quality and thickness as Amazon Basics brand dog bags. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: TimeFlying

customer_reviews.title: I thought they were biodegradable
customer_reviews.text: Arghhh...I put them in my cart to save them for a later purchase b/c we don't even have a dog yet but i then accidentally purchased them when I purchased another item. I put them in my AMAZON cart bc i thought they were biodegradable (made of vegetable cellulose) but they aren't. Ther are normal plastic bags . :-( I had searched for biodegradable poop bags on amazon and these popped up. Kind of deceiving as I did not actually wanna purchase regular plastic bags. :-( :-( :-(
customer_reviews.author: claudia

customer_reviews.title: It's a Dirty Job...
customer_reviews.text: It's a dirty job, but dog owners need to do it. We recently started camping with our rescue dog, a big fellow with a big poop. I picked up a pre-loaded Earth Care bag container that attaches to our leash at the camping store. I can tell you, picking that smelly stuff up with these lovely lavender scented bags is much nicer than a plain bag. At one campground they provided plain bags and there was just no comparison. My sweet hubby asked me to make sure we never run out of these Earth Care bags. The container/dispenser is so convenient, and being able to refill it is economical. Thanks Earth Care. We highly recommend your products!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Scented dog scat bags, game changer!
customer_reviews.text: The bags hide the sent of the dog scat. They are sturdy and large enough to pick the scat up with no risk of getting your hands dirty. I walk 2 dogs, 3 times a day. One dog does his deed early in the walk and the other almost when were done. The scented bags hide the smell so well, while holding enough scat that first dropping bags fits into the other with plenty of room to spare. Did I mention, the scent hides the dog crap smell. Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gutknecht

customer_reviews.title: Great poo bags
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these multiple times. Great bags. The scented ones are great, but by the time I’ve gone through a box of the scented ones I can’t smell them (unused) without smelling poo too, so I like to rotate between unscented and scented. My bf says he prefers the scented ones and can’t ever smell poo so might just be me and my sensitive nose. For context, we have a 1.5 year old boxer who poops a lot. We live in a townhome community with shared green belts - that’s a lot of poo to pick up daily. Good quality and I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenay

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but difficult to open bag
customer_reviews.text: I like that these bags are sturdy and repels some of the stinky odor with its scent. The BIGGEST drawback and the reason why I don't plan on re-ordering is because it is so hard to open the bags once you tear it off the dispenser. I'm standing in the middle of the sidewalk trying to open the stupid bag while my puppy runs off to try to eat something or step in his poop. I have to spit on my fingers or the bag to get traction to open the thing - which is not very covid friendly. I definitely don't recommend if you don't have the patience.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: just a bit bigger?
customer_reviews.text: Got these to scoop the cat box and I have a ragdoll, which is a fairly large cat. The bags are easy to get off the roll, nice and sturdy and the smell does not go through them. I just wish they were a little bit bigger. In order to tie the bag shut, I usually have to do that after one fill which is kind of a waste. Otherwise, I am dropping a full bag that I can't tie into the trash can. Other than that, it is a wonderful bag. I like that the smell is held in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mom to 4 Ragdolls

customer_reviews.title: Great bags & great dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: These bags & dispenser are awesome. The dispenser is always hanging on the leash handle with plenty of bags available, I no longer have to worry about my dog going twice during his walk and not havinga second bag! The clip on the side is my fave feature; I didn't have to hold on to 2 bags yesterday! The bags are not too thin; I haven't had any issues with them breaking while dispensing or worse, tearing while picking up. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Qttxchik

customer_reviews.title: good enough i guess ??
customer_reviews.text: i've gotten this brand before at marshalls/tj maxx and they're not bad, so i ordered on amazon this time given the current pandemic. i had never tried the lavender scent before, but based on promising reviews, i went for it. according to my dad, they "smell worse than the crap itself," but he always has something to say, so... i don't know... buy it if you like the smell of weird lavender i guess ? the bags are sturdy though so it does what it's supposed to do.. considering everyone's wearing masks now too, i guess the scent is irrelevant anyway
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Five stars for quantity
customer_reviews.text: We have two dogs and have always loaded up on supermarket fruit and veggie bags for the results of dog walking. With the pandemic limiting our visits to markets we had to buy some bags for the purpose. I don't think it's possible to make a bag any thinner. This matters only in trying to open them. They are sturdy and hold their precious cargo securely. I was amazed at the number of bags that came in the box. They're a great value.
customer_reviews.author: NormCIO

customer_reviews.title: Our second large box and we still find them easiast & best!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are sturdy enough to handle the German Shepherd and handy enough for our old Jack Russell's multiple daily excursions. We are pleased to finally have found a biodegradable product that doesn't disintegrate while using them and isn't too flimsy to trust for large and small pickups. They fit all our various dispensers and even dispense easily straight from a purse or pocket without a dispenser. Highly recommend if you're looking for earth- and user-friendly poop bags! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Duped!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing eco-friendly about these bags is the recycled cardboard the box is made of they come in. The bags aren’t made from recycled plastic, they are not compostable, they are not biodegradable, which they don't directly claim or state, but trickery with marketing!
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bag for doggy's business
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy the cheapest bags to pick up my dog's business. Someone gave me a roll of these when I ran out of mine. I found out that it DOES matter which ones you buy. These open easier and without all the struggle I usually go through. You can't read the newspaper through the bag and therefore, the dog's business stays put in the bag, thank you for that! I bought these when I ran out of the roll my friend gave me. I will be buying these again...and again.
customer_reviews.author: VT Lady

customer_reviews.title: THEY REALLY DONT LEAK!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest, I don't have a dog. I use these bags to dump the grounds from my french press into, before throwing it in the trash. I know, it seems crazy. However, just tossing the wet coffee grounds into the trash can was a surefire way to get a leaking trash can in my kitchen. I bought these out of frustration but I'm so happy I did. The bags are biodegradable, so I feel less trashy (get it?) and I don't have wet coffee debris on my kitchen floor. Its a winning situation.
customer_reviews.author: teapot

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled
customer_reviews.text: Though these bags are sturdy and smell good, I was mislead by the marketing (my fault). They are NOT earth friendly but regular plastic. Yes, the box and inner tube are biodegradable/made of recycled materials, but don’t be mislead. Next time I will read more carefully and get biodegradable.
customer_reviews.author: HappyTrippinMamma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Poop Bags
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I’m writing a review for poop bags, but here we are. These bags are not flimsy at all, in fact they’re stronger than the typical bags you’d find. I bought the 270 value pack and I have to say, it was a good bargain. The perforations are excellent and each one has a delightful lavender scent, ahem, before you fill it with poop. The only downside is that they are made in China. Picking up my dog’s poop doesn’t suck!
customer_reviews.author: repFlorida

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE! DON'T LEAVE HOME WITHOUT THEM!
customer_reviews.text: I have a roll of these with me attached to my dog leash. I usually have an extra roll somewhere in my bag, or pocket. These are the BEST bags I have found. They are wide enough for big hands, and deep enough for "big jobs". I get the green ones and feel very "Earth Friendly" when I use them. I am thrilled to get my monthly shipment. My dispenser always has a refill. It's a bonus to have an extra bag for unusual occurrences on our walks, such as needing to use it as a sanitary "glove" for opening doors, picking up bones or carrying items. Like I said, "I LOVE THESE BAGS"
customer_reviews.author: drhill~

customer_reviews.title: NOT Unscented!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like these bags in every way except that the are not as advertised. The bags are strong, easy to dispense and easy to open. The scent is not strong, but i am highly sensitive to any scent and they definately have one despite being labeled unscented. My only problem with these is that. I have purchased these same bags in other places and they had a scent, but I was hoping these would be different. Oh, well. Lesson learned. Must keep looking for truly unscented bags.
customer_reviews.author: KenzieKitty

customer_reviews.title: Not compostable or biodegradable
customer_reviews.text: I should have read more in the product details before buying, but these are not environmentally friendly. The box they come in and the inner roll are cardboard (that’s good) but the bag is a normal plastic bag :/ please read the details if it’s important to you. The messaging and advertising of the bag made it seem like they were biodegradable but they are not. Am not repurchasing and suggesting looking at other brands
customer_reviews.author: Beth H

customer_reviews.title: Strong bag and nice scent
customer_reviews.text: I have a golden retriever who poops adult sized human poops. The last thing I want to worry about is poking a hole when I scoop up his poo. Luckily this bag is super sturdy and has a nice scent to it. Morning walks are a breeze as it is strong enough to hold my dog’s poop and masking the smell until I find the nearest garbage can. Definitely recommend this for dog owners (especially if you have a large sized fur baby).
customer_reviews.author: SweetDreamsXoXo

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: This would be an excellent product if it didn't smell so bad. I had to return it because I couldn't stand the smell. Combine the "lavender" with poop and it will make you gag. I would rather just smell poop than have my hands smell like these bags, even though everything else about them is good. Seriously, do not get these because of the smell. I can hear you thinking that it can't be that bad. It is. I sent it back but accidentally still had one lying around. It kept smelling up the jar it was in. The smell stuck around forever. I still gag thinking about it. Seriously! Don't get these!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P.

customer_reviews.title: Thick plastic and sturdy.  Smells nice, too.
customer_reviews.text: I really like that these are made of thicker plastic, I don't have to worry about my finger poking thru and touching dog poop. I have 2 large dogs, which means they make big poops. When going on walks, one dog always has to poop in a bush or a tuft of grass if he can. That means that it's not an easy pick up. I don't need to worry about the back splitting or tearing while I'm taking care of the doodie duty.
customer_reviews.author: ChaiDai

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn awesome poop bags
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs (a 5 month old labraheeler puppy & a mid-size shepherd/basenji mix) & only need to use 1 bag for multiple poops on our walks so they are definitely roomy enough. No struggle trying to open the bags at all, which will be great when the temperature really drops & I don't want my fingers to freeze off whilst struggling with a bag. The scent does actually do an excellent job of covering the funk too. Pleased with my purchase & pleasantly surprised. These are a really good value, high quality poop bag!
customer_reviews.author: Pen

customer_reviews.title: Scent is very strong and seems artificial
customer_reviews.text: The bags are fine, but I desperately wish I'd ordered the unscented variety. I am a fan of actual natural lavender scent but tend to have sensitivities to other fragrances. This fragrance does not seem to be pure/natural lavender, and is very strong; I smell it the entire time I'm walking my dog, when I'd love to be breathing the fresh air. I have so many of these bags, as they seemed such a good deal, but I'm considering donating them as their scent is so bothersome.
customer_reviews.author: SnazzBooks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing doggy poop bags from the dollar store and was getting frustrated with the inability to easily rip them off the roll and the poor quality of the plastic used. I took a chance on these bags and the quality is excellent! They are nice and thick and easily torn off the roll. I really did not notice any scent but the quality is more important to me and these did not disappoint. I am very happy with my purchase and will not be shopping at the dollar store anymore for poop bags. I will continue purchasing them on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Debmeistertoo

customer_reviews.title: This product is not Earth-Friendly
customer_reviews.text: These are regular plastic waste bags. If you are looking for something that has a lower negative impact on the environment, please read carefully that what you find is biodegradable. This product uses the name Earth-Rated and green color bags to give the impression that it is earth-friendly. It is not the same thing. There are many products available through Amazon that both come in a recycled material box AND is biodegradable. Thank you for choosing biodegradable instead.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: The joy of scooping poop
customer_reviews.text: Affordable, compostable, appropriately sized for medium dogs. One bag easily accommodates the turds from my small and medium dog at the same time. No unpleasant perfumy odor to the plastic. The rolls are standard sized and fit most bag dispensers. They're responsibly packaged and well packed. The little sticker is easy to remove and never tears the bag it's adhered to. No static and easy to open, thick material that's dyed dark enough to hide the poo. I like these as much as a person can like something they're forced to buy for cleaning s***.
customer_reviews.author: IBuyStuffOnline

customer_reviews.title: Worth every scent (pun intended)
customer_reviews.text: The best bags I ever bought! I bought them originally for the idea that I hate using plastic bags on dog poop that naturally disintegrates & I thought this was a small role I could play in helping the earth. I’ve returned to them time after time because there is nothing on the market like them, eco friendly, sturdy, and the scent in nice & light but strong enough to cover fowl smells! I highly recommend them to anyone interested! Don’t waste your money on any other brand, these are perfect in every way!
customer_reviews.author: TheStacks

customer_reviews.title: Heavy “Doodie” pet waste bags
customer_reviews.text: These are the best dog doo doo bags ever. They are heavy “doodie”, on the thicker side so you don’t feel like your finger is going to poke thru when picking up after Fido. They also have a great scent too. Nothing like lavender doo doo in da mornin! Have no fear with these bags folks. Well worth the $6. I highly recommend this product. I am not being paid for this comment. I’m a consumer and quite frankly, speak from experience. I share my comments to hopefully help others from making cheap mistakes. I guarantee you will love these bags too. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bags because my husband says even if we bag her poop, it still smells, so I got these because they said there is no smell. The bags I had were useless I didn't want to just throw them out so I picked up her poop with the cheep bags and figured I would put them in the Lavender earth rated bags I just purchased ( that are not suppose to smell) and guess even double bagged they still smelled, I was so hoping these would mask the smell , but no it still stinks!!!!!!!!!!!!! : (
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These bags will do the work.
customer_reviews.text: They are good. Not excellent, but good. I would like the bags to be a little bigger and a little easier to rip apart, but overall, they are good enough and a little more. I will buy them again as the price is right compared to what I get. There are definitely better bags out there, but I'm not willing to pay the price for the upgrade as these are the perfect balance between price and what I get.
customer_reviews.author: Modesty Blaise

customer_reviews.title: Work great, difficult to open
customer_reviews.text: We use these bags exclusively to bend down and pick up our dog’s fresh laid poop like a bunch of brainwashed doggy slave people. Sometimes, when your hands are dry they are difficult to open which is necessary for use; otherwise you would just be smearing poop all over the outside of the bag and even though the bags do not come with instructions I’m fairly certain that is doing it wrong and inconsistent with the best way to use the product as intended for maximum efficiency.
customer_reviews.author: J.Roe

customer_reviews.title: Top notch dog bags...definitely the best!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many dog bags over the course of the past four years and never have been satisfied until now...wow, these are amazing and the best ever...I'm sold for life! Not only are they thick, but they hold the scent inside the bag and never release it, even in a garage in Texas with heat. I'm truly impressed with these dog bags and thanks to my amazing neighbor for telling me about them, we will never order any other brand again...these are a 10 without a doubt!
customer_reviews.author: J. Best

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst doggie bags.. first off, the scent BOTHERS me. Idk why but it just does. And can we talk about how it’s next to impossible to open these bags?! Like seriously, I look like an idiot standing over my dog just struggling to open up this poop bag. Try doing it at night... the worst.
customer_reviews.author: butterfly13

customer_reviews.title: Best Bags I've Ever Purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have found these bags to be sturdy and very easy to open (which isn't always the case with plastic poop bags). I decided to get the scented ones just to see what they were like since they were the same price as the unscented. I will never go back. It might sound silly, but the lavender scent makes a huge difference on a long walk. Not only does it mask the poop odor, it provides a very subtle lavender scent that it very pleasant (it is not overpowering at all). Additionally, the company donates a portion of the proceeds to animal rescues. It's a win-win-win. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: R. Weed

customer_reviews.title: Nice Smell, Durable
customer_reviews.text: Got these for the new puppy in the household bought the bulk box as he is never going to stop pooping. Really enjoy the lavender smell its strong enough but not overpowering. Chose this option because they are supposedly good for the earth and haven't had any issues with ripping or breaking. These tear off the roll easy enough to work one handed while corralling your dog with the other. Took one star off b/c although I'm not super familiar with poop bags I believe there are only 15 bags per roll which doesn't seem like a lot to me.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Who Would Have Thought Poop Bags Would Be A Discussion Item?
customer_reviews.text: We are new to the poop bag world. The upside is we have a small 12lb Westi so we are dealing with small volumes, pity the Saint Bernard folks. These scented bags work great and there is absolutely no oder that emits from the bag (again small dog). The only thing I find necessary to do after, is wash my hands, because you will get a bit of the bag scent on your hands when handling the bags. Who would have thunk I would be reviewing poop bags!
customer_reviews.author: CaptBarrel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Eco Friendly
customer_reviews.text: I've used Earth Rated bags for a while. They're sturdy and big enough that tying them off is pretty easy. I'd highly recommend them. I prefer the non-scented. The other ones tend to "stink up" the drawer or cabinet where you're keeping them. If you like the scent, I guess it doesn't matter. For me, the scent became associated with the "process" and I didn't really want that smell in the house. The price is definitely better on Amazon too. I've seen them in pet stores for a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: brye

customer_reviews.title: Best Bags Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I just love these bags. They are large and very sturdy, not like the flimsy blue bags sold in most stores. I have a big dog and use them like a glove to pick up waste then turn inside out and tie. Since they are biodegradable, I'm ok with throwing them into the deep thicket areas along the walking paths. I keep extras in my car and purse to handle the occasional pit stops. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Richardson

product_meta.title: Earth Rated Dog Poop Bags, Extra Thick and Strong Poop Bags for Dogs, Guaranteed Leak-Proof, 15 Doggy Bags Per Roll, Each Dog Poop Bag Measures 9 x 13 Inches
feature_bullets: Bag poop better: Our 9”x13” bags have a 100 percent leak-proof guarantee to keep your hands safe
What's in the box: 270 awesome dog poo bags on 18 refill rolls of 15 bags, and fit our dispenser too
Unscented: Poop smells like poop but our amazing scent-free poop bags lock in that stank for good
Easy peasy: Simple to open and tie securely so you can enjoy a stress-free walk with your best bud
Earth Rated: We use recycled materials in our packaging and roll cores because details matter

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
